Event.Message: Your computer has lost the lease to its IP address %1 on the Network Card with network address %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was not assigned an address from the network (by the DHCP Server) for the Network Card with network address %2. The following error occurred: %3. Your computer will continue to try and obtain an address on its own from the network address (DHCP) server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: The IP address lease %1 for the Network Card with network address %3 has been denied by the DHCP server %4 (The DHCP Server sent a DHCPNACK message).
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was not able to renew its address from the network (from the DHCP Server) for the Network Card with network address %2. The following error occurred: %3. Your computer will continue to try and obtain an address on its own from the network address (DHCP) server.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error occurred in stopping the Dhcpv4 Client service. Error code is %1. ShutDown Flag value is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer has detected that the IP address %1 for the Network Card with network address %3 is already in use on the network. Your computer will automatically attempt to obtain a different address.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was unable to automatically configure the IP parameters for the Network Card with the network address %2. The following error occurred during configuration: %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer has automatically configured the IP address for the Network Card with network address %2. The IP address being used is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was unable to initialize a Network Interface attached to the system. The error code is: %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Dhcpv6 Initialization has failed on the computer with the error code %1. Dhcp service will start with IPv4 only.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Media Connect notification received on interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Media Disconnect notification received on interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Discover is sent from the interface %1.Status code is %2

Event.Message: Offer is discarded on the interface %1. Error code is %2

Event.Message: Request is sent from the interface %1. Status code is %2

Event.Message: Ack is accepted on the interface %1. Received Address is %2.Server address is %3

Event.Message: Unknown message is discarded on the interface %1.

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BoolFlag" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Error occurred in extracting the options on the interface %1. Status code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Setting up a Fallback configuration on interface %1. The Fallback address %2 is set. The status code is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 is plumbed on the interface %2. Status code is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 is unplumbed on the interface %2. Status code is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Plumbing error has occurred on the interface %1. Status Code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Lease is expired on the interface %1. Expired address is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: An interface is added whose interface index is %1 and Status Code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error has occurred in initializing the interface %1. Error Code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Routes are updated on the interface %1. Status Code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCPv4 client service is started
DHCPv4 client service is stopped. ShutDown Flag value is %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error occurred in initializing DHCPv4. Error Code is %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error has occurred in opening the socket on the interface %1. Error Code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: An error has occurred in closing the socket on the interface %1. Error Code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Domain change notification is received from DNS
DNS registration has happened for the interface %1. Status Code is %2. DNS Flag settings is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="Dword" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DNS Deregistration has happened for the interface %1. Status Code is %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Inform ack is received on the interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: A network error occurred when trying to send a message on interface %1. The error code is: %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Gateway address %1 is reachable on the interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Gateway is not reachable on the interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Your computer was successfully assigned an address from the network, and it can now connect to other computers.
Route is added with the values Dest = %1, DestMask = %2, NextHop = %3, Address = %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Str1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str4" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Route is deleted with the values Dest = %1, DestMask = %2, NextHop = %3, Address = %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Str1" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str2" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str3" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Str4" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: An offer is received for the dummy discovers that are sent for Diagnostics on the interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Checking reachability of gateway %1 on the the interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has notified NLA for the configuration changes for the interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has run the cache scavenger for the interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has found a match in the cache for Service Set Identifier(SSID) %1(Hexadecimal value of SSID: %2) for the Network Card with the network address %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has plumbed an address using Service Set Identifier(SSID) %1(Hexadecimal value of SSID: %2) for the Network Card with the network address %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has received a Service Set Identifier(SSID) %1(Hexadecimal value of SSID: %2) for the Network Card with the network address %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Address %1 being plumbed for adapter %2 already exists
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The broadcast bit %1 was successfully set and cached on the interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BoolFlag" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has not received a Service Set Identifier(SSID) for the interface %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has not found a match in the cache for Service Set Identifier(SSID) %1(Hexadecimal value of SSID: %2) for the interface %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Network Diagnostics Framework(NDF) discovery is being initiated on interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Network Diagnostics Framework(NDF) discovery failed to discover a DHCP server on interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Firewall port %1 is exempted on interface %2. Error code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Firewall port %1 is closed on interface %2. Error code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has not plumbed an address using Service Set Identifier(SSID) %1(Hexadecimal value of SSID: %2) for the Network Card with the network address %4 since the lease has expired
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="NetworkHintString" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="NetworkHint" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HWLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="HWAddress" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="HWLength"/> </template>

Event.Message: Regular address acquisition will be done on interface %1 because aggressive address acquisition is turned ON.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has cancelled IPv4 address acquisition cycle after %1 DISCOVER transmissions on interface %2 because the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the DHCP IPv6 address %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attempting to acquire a reference for interface %1. Error code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Attempting to release the reference for interface %1. Error code is %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Registered duplicate address detection on interface %1 for IP address %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: Completed duplicate address detection on interface %1 for IP address %2. Error code is %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Duplicate address detection on interface %1 for IP address %2 timed out - reattempting.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: Parameter change request registered for process %1 with descriptor %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UniqueID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="EventPath" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClassIDSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ClassID" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="ClassIDSize"/> <data name="OptListSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OptList" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="OptListSize"/> <data name="IsVendor" inType="win:Boolean" outType="xs:boolean"/> </template>

Event.Message: Parameter change request unregistered for process %1 with descriptor %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UniqueID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Parameter change request notified for process %1 with descriptor %2. The status of the operation was %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="ProcID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="UniqueID" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: Parameter request received on interface with LUID %1. Attempting to acquire the interface context.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceLUID" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="ClassIDSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ClassID" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="ClassIDSize"/> <data name="StandardOptListSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StandardOptList" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="StandardOptListSize"/> <data name="VendorOptListSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VendorOptList" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="VendorOptListSize"/> </template>

Event.Message: Parameter request unblocked on interface with LUID %1 and index %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceLUID" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Parameter request completed on interface with LUID %1 and index %2. The status of the operation was %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceLUID" inType="win:HexInt64" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> <data name="OptDataSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OptData" inType="win:Binary" outType="xs:hexBinary" length="OptDataSize"/> </template>

Event.Message: Firewall port %2 exemption triggered on interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Firewall port %2 close triggered on interface %1.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has cancelled IPv4 address acquisition cycle after %1 DISCOVER transmissions on interface %2 because the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the stateless IPv6 address %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP has cancelled IPv4 address acquisition cycle after %1 DISCOVER transmissions on interface %2 because the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the static IPv6 address %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DwordVal1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP will not try regular IPv4 address acquisition on interface %1 since the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has the IPv6 address %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:Binary" outType="win:IPv6" length="16"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP will try regular IPv4 address acquisition on interface %1 even though the machine is in Connected Standby state since the interface has no IPv6 address.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: DHCP will try regular IPv4 address acquisition on interface %1 due to registry settings even though the machine is in Connected Standby state and the interface has an IPv6 address.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: The DHCPv4 client received connected standby entry notification.
The DHCPv4 client received connected standby exit notification.
PERFTRACK (Request-Ack): Address confirmed for the interface %2.Confirmed Address is %3.Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DORA): Offer is accepted on the interface %2.Offered Address is %3.Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: Gateway is reachable on the interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: DHCP is not enabled on the interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: Setting up Fallback configuration on the interface %2 since no response is received for request. Status code is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Ack): Address confirmed for the interface %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT-REBOOT. Confirmed address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Nack-Dora): Offer is accepted on the interface %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT-REBOOT. Offered Address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Init-Dora): Offer is accepted on the interface %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT. Offered Address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Ack): Address confirmed for the interface %2.Confirmed Address is %3.Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DORA): Offer is accepted on the interface %2.Offered Address is %3.Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: Gateway is reachable on the interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: DHCP is not enabled on the interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: Setting up Fallback configuration on the interface %2 since no response is received for request. Status code is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="StatusCode" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:ErrorCode"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Ack): Address confirmed for the interface %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT-REBOOT. Confirmed address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-Nack-Dora): Offer is accepted on the interface %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT-REBOOT. Offered Address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Init-Dora): Offer is accepted on the interface %2 after toggling the broadcast bit in INIT. Offered Address is %3. Server address is %4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Address1" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="Address2" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPv4): Media Connect on interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (DHCPv4): End of Media Connect on interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Media Reconnect): Media reconnect notification was received on interface %2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Discover-DelayedResponse): Offer/Ack is not received for first discover/request on interface %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Discover-Timeout): No response is received for all 8 discovers on interface %2. Fallback address is not set.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-DelayedAck): Ack is not received for first request on interface %2.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK (Request-NoResponse): There is no response for INIT-REBOOT Request on interface %2. Gateway is not reachable and fallback address is not set.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: PERFTRACK: Fallback address %2 is plumbed on interface %3 after DHCP did not get response for discover.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="InterfaceGuid" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Address" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:IPv4"/> <data name="InterfaceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>
